name: PenguinCRM
tag_list: sugarcrm-consulting, sugarcrm-customization-india, sugarcrm-offshore-development, joomla-based-websites, open-source-business-tool, magento-development, sales-force-automation
overview:
PenguinCRM is an India (Hyderabad) based CRM consulting company which provides end to end implementation of affordable CRM to its clients. It enhances and modifies SugarCRM, which is the leading open source CRM application, to achieve the desired customization and to fit with the exact need of the organizations. PenguinCRM put its best to make this application user friendly yet effective. It has served many organizations across the world and getting repeat business from its existing satisfied clients.

Following are the expertise of Penguin CRM: CRM consulting, SugarCRM development, SugarCRM customization, Marketing software, Bulk mailing software, Sales Force Automation, Lead and contact management system, call center CRM, Help desk software, Ticketing system, Customer support software.
